def mutation(bacteria,n_mutaions):
    size1 = bacteria.shape[0]
    size2 = bacteria.shape[1]
    
    for i in range(n_mutations):
        rand1 = np.random.randint(0,size1)
        rand2 = np.random.randint(0,size2)
        rand3 = np.random.randint(1,2)
        
        
        bacteria[rand1,rand2,rand3]= np.random.randint(0,10)
        
    return bacteria
